ENROL_D.description: Date of enrolment into the cohort

NAIVE_Y.description: Is the patient ART-naive upon enrollment?

PROPH_Y.description: Prior to enrollment, has the patient been exposed to antiretroviral therapy for prophylaxis such as PMTCT, PREP, or PEP?

RECART_Y.description: Has the patient ever received antiretroviral treatment?

RECART_D.description: Date of first antiretroviral treatment initiation.

AIDS_Y.description: Has patient ever been given an AIDS diagnosis?

MODE_OTH.description: Text description of "other" mode of infection (MODE=90)

HIV_POS_D.description: Date of first positive HIV test

PROGRAM.description: Program with which the center is associated

RURAL.description: Code for the site situation (facility location)

OPEN_D.description: (Optional) Date of opening of dataset: earliest date for which data were included from this site

ADD_CENTER.description: Inclusion date: date that the site was added to the cohort

DROP_CENTER.description: (Optional) Exclusion date: date that the site was dropped from the cohort

SURVEY_INTERNET.description: Quality of Internet access for completing online surveys

SURVEY_PAPER.description: Resources for printing and transferring paper surveys to a central location for data entry

LAST_REVIEWED_D.description: Date when center data in this table was last reviewed and/or updated

UTT_D.description: Start date of Universal Test and Treat services (Treat-All) at this site

ROUTINE_VL_D.description: Date the site began performing routine viral load testing for all patients

TREATALL_D.description: Start date of "Treat All" guideline implementation at this site

TEST_ID.description: A unique identifier linking this record to tblLAB_RES_LVL_2 and tblLAB_RES_LVL_3

SAMPLE_D.description: Date of the actual sample taken (NOT the test date)

SEQ_DT.description: Date and time when the sequencing was performed

LAB.description: Name of laboratory where the test was performed

LIBRARY.description: Library/algorithm used to identify resistance mutations

REFSEQ.description: Name/identifier of reference strain used to find mutations

KIT.description: Vendor and version/name of the kit used for the test

SOFTWARE.description: Software and version used to determine resistance

TEST_ID.description: Identifier linking this record to tblLAB_RES

AA_POS.description: Position of the mutation in the sequence

AA_FOUND_1.description: Mutation (Amino acid) found in the sequence

AA_FOUND_2.description: Mutation (Amino acid) found in the sequence (if more than 1)

AA_FOUND_3.description: Mutation (Amino acid) found in the sequence (if more than 2)

AA_FOUND_4.description: Mutation (Amino acid) found in the sequence (if more than 3)

RES_SCOR.description: Score of resistance or recommendation given from the test

RES_SCOR_ID.description: Coded score of the resistance or recommendation given from the test
